FLAVOUR_0_FAILUREMSG.message: You failed to win the race.

FLAVOUR_1_FAILUREMSG.message: You failed to be the first.

FLAVOUR_0_INTROTEXT.message: Welcome fellow pilot. Destination system is {system} ({sectorX}, {sectorY}, {sectorZ}) and final destination location is {spaceport}. Reward is {cash}. Current race record is {record}. Standard participation fee is {fee}.

FLAVOUR_1_INTROTEXT.message: Hello fellow pilot. Destination system is {system} ({sectorX}, {sectorY}, {sectorZ}) and final destination location is {spaceport}. You will be rewarded {cash} if you win. Current race record is {record}. Standard participation fee is {fee}.

FLAVOUR_2_INTROTEXT.message: Hi commander. Destination system is {system} ({sectorX}, {sectorY}, {sectorZ}) and final destination location is {spaceport}. You will be rewarded {cash} if you win. Current race record is {record}. Standard participation fee is {fee}.

FLAVOUR_3_INTROTEXT.message: Grettings, commander. Destination system is {system} ({sectorX}, {sectorY}, {sectorZ}) and final destination location is {spaceport}. You will be rewarded {cash} if you win. Current race record is {record}. Standard participation fee is {fee}.
